text: Datɨrɨghɨn kɨ nguazimɨn iti, ezɨ gɨn me na fegh ter ighuvimɨn na aguragham, eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn kɨ gumazamiziba bar me damutɨ me na bagh izam.”(12:32) Iesus ghaze, “Gumaziba na fegh ter ighuvimɨn na aguragham.” Tuavir kamra, God a feghtɨ an an Nguibamɨn mangɨ, egh bar pɨn ikiam. Nɨ Filipai 2:9-11ɨn gan.
